document.heading: Land Acquisition for Housing Development Opportunities Program Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-260, the “Land Acquisition for Housing Development Opportunities Program Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-602, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 15, 2010, and September 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 5, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-544 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-260 became effective on December 3, 2010.
